mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (R_NO, ID, P_NO, CONTENT) VALUES(SEQ_REVIEW.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{p_no}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET CONTENT = #{content} WHERE R_NO = #{r_no}
mapper.select: SELECT PR.R_NO R_NO, U.ID ID, U.NICKNAME NICKNAME, PR.REGDATE REGDATE, PR.CONTENT CONTENT FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(R IDX_REVIEW) */ R.ID ID, R.REGDATE REGDATE, R.CONTENT CONTENT, R.P_NO P_NO, R.R_NO R_NO FROM PARTY P, REVIEW R WHERE P.P_NO = R.P_NO ) PR, USERS U WHERE PR.ID = U.ID AND PR.P_NO = #{p_no}
